plays.text: Penalty to Eric Weinrich 2 minutes for High Sticking Scott Gomez
Goal scored by Jan Hlavac assisted by Kim Johnsson
Penalty to ANDREI ZYUZIN 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Jan Hlavac
Goal scored by Bobby Holik assisted by Randy McKay and Jay Pandolfo
Goal scored by Simon Gagne assisted by Mark Recchi and Keith Primeau
Penalty to Patrik Elias 2 minutes for Roughing Eric Desjardins
Goal scored by Ruslan Fedotenko unassisted
